Niagara College Admission Requirements, English Language Proficiency Requirements , steps on how to apply, General Admission Requirements.

Niagara College Admission Application is out for all interested candidates who want to apply for admission: the Admission is open for all nationals:

Niagara College Admission Requirements and How to apply

Applicants who have completed studies outside Canada may be required to provide one of the following:

  • Niagara college mature student Test for English.
  • An international student who completed a maximum of two years of full-time secondary level education or one year of full-time post secondary or higher education in a country where English is the official language.

Niagara College’s English for Academic training program (EAP) achievement of Level 5 English for Academic Preparation (EAP) program with 70% and no individual grade under 50% Completion of Level 5 English for Academic Preparation (EAP) program with 75% and no individual grade under 60%

 

In general, the Admission Requirements are

Undergraduate programs include:

  • High school transcripts
  • Proof of English proficiency

Graduate programs include:

  • Post-secondary transcript
  • Proof of English proficiency
